revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Pokéball Factory |image = [[File:Pokéball Factory.png|250px]] |caption = A map of Pokéball Factory. |tokens = 615,000 |location = North of Laverre City }} '''Pokéball Factory''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kalos]]. It initially has 100 tiles arranged in a 10x10 square, including 10 chest tiles, 23 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 8,173,950 HP.
==Encounter Tables== <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | rowspan=5|<center> N/A || [[File:Team_Flare_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Flare Grunt || [[File:Toxicroak.png|40px]] Toxicroak |- | [[File:Team_Flare_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Flare Grunt || [[File:Mightyena.png|40px]] Mightyena, [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat |- | [[File:Team_Flare_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Flare Grunt || [[File:Scraggy.png|40px]] Scraggy, [[File:Mightyena.png|40px]] Mightyena |- | [[File:Team_Flare_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Flare Grunt || [[File:Swalot.png|40px]] Swalot |- | [[File:Team_Flare_Admin_(female).png|40px]] Team Flare Admin || [[File:Scraggy.png|40px]] Scraggy, [[File:Houndoom.png|40px]] Houndoom |}
